event.name: BA_BufferAccepted
event.comment: The Buffer Accumulator instance accepted and enqueued a buffer. To avoid uncontrolled sending of events, this event occurs only when the previous buffer received caused a QueueFull error.

event.name: BA_QueueFull
event.comment: The Buffer Accumulator instance received a buffer when its queue was full. To avoid uncontrolled sending of events, this event occurs only when the previous buffer received did not cause a QueueFull error.
